lyric: 作词 : Ruby Qu/王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)/YMIR
作曲 : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)/宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
编曲 Arranger : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)/宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
制作人 Producer : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)/宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
I feel the pain and anger, wicked monster, losin' control
translation: 愤怒 源自苦弱 邪恶生物挣脱枷锁

lyric: I'm ready for a battle, wakened shadow, blood on my soul
translation: 步入 硝烟战火 阴影苏醒金血入魄

lyric: Burn it, burning it all, heavens, let them fall~ Haha
translation: 烧吧 烧尽神国 乐园 已陨落 哈哈

lyric: They taste of bitter ashes, littered plastic, crumblin' away
translation: 痛饮 死灰苦涩 糟粕四散崩溃沉没

lyric: They glimpse the broken faces, devil racin', searching for faith
translation: 掠过 面孔零落 恶兽驰骋争向神堕

lyric: Crushing, crushing it all, shadows, watch them crawl~ Hahaha
translation: 撕破 撕裂所有 黑夜 也跪我

lyric: Creepin' up my brain
translation: 癫狂染意念

lyric: Learnin' from my pain
translation: 苦痛中蔓延

lyric: Baby watchin' it burn, send death to isolation
translation: 白夜 烈日燎燃 看孤身 爆发耀斑

lyric: Oh watchin' it burn, ain't got no hesitation
translation: （Oh） 厄焰狂乱 看骄阳 无畏崩坍（oh）

lyric: Watchin' it burn, we're fallin' higher
translation: 越是粉碎（我）越要俯瞰

lyric: Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh~
I'll cast your dark intentions, convolution, never before
translation: 破纵横 阴谋交错 斩断混沌从未有过

lyric: I'll fight with skeletons, adrenaline, conviction in war
translation: 焚血骨 血灰血肉 激素迸射定罪战火

lyric: Terror, terror is near, I will shatter you all!
translation: 来吧 恐怖压迫，碾碎 这世末！

lyric: Baby watchin' it burn, send death to isolation
translation: 白夜 烈日燎燃 看孤身 爆发耀斑

lyric: Oh watchin' it burn, ain't got no hesitation
translation: （oh）厄焰狂乱 看骄阳 无畏崩坍（oh）

lyric: Watchin' it burn, we're fallin' higher
translation: 越是粉碎（我）越要俯瞰

lyric: Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh~
Watchin' it burn! Oh watchin' it burn!
translation: 爆发耀斑（oh）无畏崩坍

lyric: Watchin' it burn!
translation: 越是粉碎

lyric: Watchin' it burn!
translation: 越 要 俯 瞰

lyric: Like glass that shattered, reaching through the darkness
translation: 琉璃成飞灰 偏要刺破黑夜

lyric: Voices trailing fires, echo of desires
translation: 呼声牵动残焰 自由渴念不歇

lyric: A world of silence, sound of Death's parading
translation: 沉默这世界 末日狂欢不灭

lyric: Phantoms in the shadow, softly waiting…
translation: 直到往日旧念 为我阖眼……

lyric: I'm tearin' it down! Embrace the detonation
translation: 撕碎 金血怒绽 拥抱我 爆裂璀璨

lyric: Burnin' it loud! Cravin' our damn creation
translation: 三千万转 响彻这 罪业回环（oh）

lyric: Breakin' the chain! I'm reachin' for ya
translation: 锁链挣断（我）向你之畔

lyric: Oh oh oh oh oh oh yeah!!
Shout till the end! This blaze is my salvation!
translation: 咆哮 直至终焉 此身为 救世烈焰

lyric: Sword in the wind! I strike without damnation!
translation: 侵晨作剑 再创世 无毁信念

lyric: Shatter the skies! No fate, no king, no god!
translation: 破晓星天 轮回 命运 乌有

lyric: Fall to my name!
translation: 向我俯首！

lyric: Fall to my name!
translation: 向我俯首！

lyric: Fall to my name!
translation: 向我俯首！

lyric: Fall to my name!
translation: 向我俯首！

lyric: Fall to my name!
translation: 向我俯首！

lyric: Fall to my name!
translation: 向我俯首！

lyric: … my name!
translation: 向 我

lyric: Fall to my name!
translation: 向我俯首！
